steps.text: First, you will play a brief practice round.
The practice round will start soon.
Now that you've got the hang of it, let's get going!

In this round, you may collect any crystal you wish. 

 All crystals are worth the same amount of points
The next round will start soon.

In this round, you may collect any crystal you wish. 

 All crystals are worth the same amount of points 

 The game may be difficult to see. This is normal. Just play the best that you can!
The next round will start soon.

In this round, some of the crystals are dangerous!

If you collect two of the same crystal in a row 

 you will lose 1000 points!
The next round will start soon.

Thanks for playing! 

 You will now complete the gambling task to earn extra money
